p: The number of fragments per kilobase of exon per million fragments mapped (FPKM) was used to estimate the relative expression levels [ 36] and the FPKM of unigenes were estimated using the software RSEM v1.2.15 [ 37], with the Trimmed Mean of M-values method. Differential expression analysis of two chemotypes of C. camphora samples was performed using read counts with the DESeq R package (v1.10.1) [ 38]. The resulting P-values were adjusted to Q-values to compensate for multiple hypothesis testing [ 39]. Genes with an adjusted Q-value <â€‰0.05 found by DESeq were assigned as differentially expressed. GO enrichment analysis of differentially expressed genes (DEGs) were performed using the GOseq R package (version 1.10.0) based on the Wallenius non-central hypergeometric distribution, which can adjust for gene length bias in DEGs [ 40]. KEGG enrichment analysis was performed with KOBAS version 2.0.12 software [ 41].
